summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Wake Lock and Skip Tutorial features. Both features working correctly with proper UI implementation and localStorage persistence. Backend API fully functional with 100% test success rate.
passed_tests: Backend API - All 29 tests passed (100% success rate)
Authentication endpoints (register, login, profile)
Speed limit API with various coordinate scenarios
Gamification features (stats, badges)
Export reports functionality
Family mode (create, join, leave)
Speed trap crowdsourcing features
Trip history and recording workflow
Wake Lock feature - Settings panel shows 'Keep Screen On' toggle at top
Wake Lock feature - Toggle is ON by default (cyan colored)
Wake Lock feature - Settings persist across page reloads
Skip Tutorial feature - Skip button present in onboarding
Skip Tutorial feature - Clicking skip sets 'onboardingComplete' in localStorage
Skip Tutorial feature - Page reloads directly to main app when localStorage set
Settings persistence - Theme, alert delay, weather toggle persist across reloads
Settings Panel UI - All required toggles visible (Theme, Keep Screen On, Weather Alerts, Audio Alarm, Voice Alerts)
Frontend basic load - Google Maps displays correctly
Frontend basic load - Speedometer shows properly
UI navigation - Settings panel opens and closes correctly
UI navigation - Features panel accessible
UI navigation - Center location button present
Theme switching functionality (light/dark)
Speed unit switching (MPH/KM/H)
Demo mode functionality
Responsive design - UI adapts to different viewport sizes
localStorage persistence across browser sessions

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all Wake Lock and Skip Tutorial features working correctly)
